allow: Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; d=json.load\(sys.stdin\); print\(''Status:'', d[''status'']\); print\(''\\nLast 20 log entries:''\); logs=d.get\(''logs'',''''\); import json; l=json.loads\(logs\) if isinstance\(logs, str\) else logs; print\(''\\n''.join\([str\(e.get\(''output'',''''\)\)[:200] for e in \(l[-20:] if isinstance\(l, list\) else []\)]\)\)")
